node.name: Founder
node.description: Big DAO, is a pioneering force in the world of web3. This family-owned DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) is notable for establishing "The Creative" web3 ecosystem. By leveraging blockchain technology, Big DAO aims to revolutionize the way intellectual property and creative content are managed and monetized. It's all about empowering creatives to earn a sustainable income from their work and, at the same time, building generational wealth for the family behind it. In essence, Big DAO merges the innovative spirit of web3 with the solidity of traditional investment strategies to create a unique and impactful approach in the entertainment and tech industries.
